website_summaries.verdict: This drum head features a floating muffling system, which gives it a pre-dampened, natural sound.
pros: Durable two-ply drum head made of Nu-Brite film
Built-in patented floating felt muffle ring
cons: Some find this head's sound to be a bit muffled

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have never put a superkick 2 on an old kick drum...... its like putting a mustang engine in a toyota Corolla. This is the third time I have experienced it and I always think it won't be as amazing as I remember.... but it was even more so. I bought a cheap used mapex. Kick sounded drab. Again, cheap kit...... after playing with tuning the remo head it had on it i finally ordered one of these.... absolutely amazing. I barely had to tune it at all. Thumps. This is the one most important thing you can do. I think with ducktape and a superkick 2 I can make any drumset sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jahred Namaste

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sound great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews saying how great it sounds so I suppose I had unrealistic expectations. I found the head to make my drum impossible to tune (there is no resonance so there is no resonant tone) and super quiet. It just sounds super, super dead and thuddy. I ended up putting my old batter head back on (but keeping the Aquarian resonant head). Used minimal muting and tuned it with a Tune Bot so the intervals are spot on, and it sounds 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tragic

customer_reviews.title: this is the best bass drum head available
customer_reviews.text: To me, this is the best bass drum head available. Yes, you pay for it, but it sounds great, it's durable, and you will get your money's worth. At a recent gig, my bass drum mic had to be turned off because of too much vibration form a shaky stage. I didn't want to lose the sound of a thumping bass drum, so I was stomping extra hard on the pedal. My current head is kind of old now, so I thought I'd go right thru it, but there were no problems whatsoever (and it sounded awesome!). The ring reduction strip around it works wonders. Only bass head I will ever use.
customer_reviews.author: Lounge Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: This head does exactly what you want a bass drum batter head to do.It gives you a big, dry sound with little to no ring or overtones. You can select from two foam rings supplied with the head to get the right amount of muffling you desire. I don't know why any serious drummer would want to use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Robe

customer_reviews.title: Improving Entry Level Drums Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mapex Storm drum set and it sounded pretty bad out of the box. Part of it was my ignorance concerning how to tune a kick drum properly, but most of it was the terrible factory heads it came with. I bought this and another Aquarian head and everything sounds so much better. This is definitely a relatively inexpensive way to upgrade your kick drum without buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rondina

customer_reviews.title: Aquarian makes THE BEST bass drum heads
customer_reviews.text: This bass drum batter head is PERFECT! It has a sound damping ring built in, it's heavy duty and sounds fantastic! It's all I will every buy for my bass drum! As a live stage drummer, the bass drum heads HAVE to be durable and able to withstand the harsh drumming I do, I'll never select a different head!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sabens

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use another bass head again
customer_reviews.text: Year ago a bought my first Aquarian SKII. I don't remember why; I think the guy at the music store recommended it. I loved it instantly. Since then, I have not been able to find this model in local stores, so I have bought other heads (even other Aquarian Super Kicks) and been disappointed every time. Never again; as long as Aquarian continues to make this model, I will go out of my way to order it. I can't promise it's got the sound you're looking for but it's perfect for me: a deep resonance that sounds equally at home in a Beatles song or a badass hip-hop beat. Can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceage Polymer

customer_reviews.title: Decided to give Aquarian a try and really love the sound this head brings out of my 14x22 ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a long time fan of the Remo Powerstroke and have used Evans EMAD heads in the past. Decided to give Aquarian a try and really love the sound this head brings out of my 14x22 maple Ludwig kick! I need no muffling with is good because I run a Kelly Shu internal mic mounting system and there's not much room for a pillow or other means of baffling. I'm happy. Going to remain an Aquarian user for a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Georgenes

customer_reviews.title: Best Bass Drum Head
customer_reviews.text: This Head Paired with the Front Regulator Head is the best on the market and has been for a while. I use this on both my Sonor Pro Lite and Delite kits and it's unbelievable and makes using any internal muffling pointless. Powerstroke 3 is fantastic as well depending on the kit. Can't go wrong with this head.
customer_reviews.author: JP Drums

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss with this head, try it you'll buy
customer_reviews.text: Best kick drum head there is, never have broken one despite at least two gigs a week for almost ten years. Still sounded great but only recently replaced it with another when I changed-out all the other heads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do yourself a favor and just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite bass drum head ever. paired with the Aquarian bass drum patches i get this LOUD deep cutting bass tone. the head lasts like 3 times as long as any Evans head ive ever used. ill never use another bass drum head other than the Aquarian clear Superkick 2
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best Bass Head
customer_reviews.text: Immediately changed the sound of the bass from boomy to focused and thumping. Awesome and highly recommended easy and immediate fix to make your bass sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C.

customer_reviews.title: Sonically perfect, durable, and unique!
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding kick head next to Evan's EMAD. Better price, durability, unique sound quality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Howard

customer_reviews.title: For serious drummers only.
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. I finally had to replace my beater side...Had the same one for 10 years, 4 albums, 1000 shows and an innumerable amount of rehersals. True sound every time. Holds tune longer than any other head. Just foolish to buy any other drum head. These have the most amount of technology and the best sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bencro

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding head.
customer_reviews.text: Good for big, fat sound, I use it for recording. Very easy to get variable sounds with out over dampening head. I had to do very little tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: JR44

customer_reviews.title: Fat!
customer_reviews.text: other than an Evans "Emad", this is the fattest sounding bass drum head I've found. If you want your 22" drum to punch like it's on steroids, this could be what your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: chip sciarra

customer_reviews.title: ... came with a dimple/dent near the hoop that looked pretty bad. I mounted it on the drum and ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a dimple/dent near the hoop that looked pretty bad. I mounted it on the drum and tightened and it smoothed out as I didn't want to deal with return hassle and I hope it doesn't bite me later with a failure. My prior Super kick II head was a delight and this one sounds good too of course.
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kick Head
customer_reviews.text: Once put on the head needs no additional muffling. Great punch, nice full sound. Just tune to desired sound and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite Bass Drum Beater Head!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time, I have a completely empty bass drum and enjoy the tone! I read many positive reviews on this and decided to try it. So glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Get bass drum heads, good sound, durable
customer_reviews.text: I've long used the heads on my pair of 18x22's. Great dampening and awesome durability. I also bought the matching reso heads this time.
customer_reviews.author: SabaticGoat

customer_reviews.title: I have the "other" brand too, prefer this one for bass
customer_reviews.text: This seems to give just the perfect blend of mid/high for attack, and bass for punch. Muffled, but not TOO much (my opinion about that other brand).
customer_reviews.author: wild bill medic

customer_reviews.title: Very Muffled
customer_reviews.text: This is really really muffled. This might be what you want but it is way too muffled for me. And the felt ring that creates the muffling is glued onto the head so it cannot be removed. I like a little bit of sustain - its just me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ehmke

customer_reviews.title: Deep base tone sounds great
customer_reviews.text: We tried a coated base drum head. Not a good idea for a base. This is a superior base drum head.
customer_reviews.author: Daves

customer_reviews.title: Great head, many people swear by this.
customer_reviews.text: This used to be the only head I'd ever consider... and it does sound good, especially mic'd... I use this now and I've loved this for a while. But I give four stars because a house kit once had an Evans Emad Onyx and it was unnnnbelievable. So, I'm gonna try that next. I'll update this review if necessary...
customer_reviews.author: jordan thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good head!
customer_reviews.text: Takes quite a beating from double pedals and stands up to many months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Stbknrlx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked them better before they were made in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: ... last one I had lasted forever and always sounding good. I got compliments from stage hands on my ...
customer_reviews.text: The last one I had lasted forever and always sounding good. I got compliments from stage hands on my kick drum sound at different venues using this head. My old one finally broke so now I just bought a new one and I love it. I'll only use these kick drum heads for as long as I play!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, it improved the sound of the kick drum.
customer_reviews.author: H.Lara

customer_reviews.title: Best kick head that I know.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bass drum head that I know of. Excellent sound, range, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The industry standard
customer_reviews.text: I will never use any batter head for rock drums except this one. The Super-Kick II is unrivaled in every sense - durability, tone, quality, even looks. Nothing any other brand makes even comes close, save maybe the Remo Powerstroke III. Even then, it's a close match, and all down to preference.
customer_reviews.author: willdrumforfood01

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bar None
customer_reviews.text: Only Kick Head as far as I'm concerned. No internal muffling needed.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best batter head I have ever used. It is powerful and sounds fantastic. No additional muffling needed. I plan to replace the heads on my other kits with these. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: K. McArthur

customer_reviews.text: Best kick drum head I have ever used. I put it on all my kits now. Easy to get the sound you want out of a kick drum with this and a regulator reso.
customer_reviews.author: Reese D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only BD head I will use. My last one lasted forever.
customer_reviews.author: K. Geisler

customer_reviews.title: The best kick-drum head ever
customer_reviews.text: The best kick-drum head ever. Save your head by picking up the DKP2 kick pad, and switch over to the more articulate plastic-beater from your foam beater.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Best kick drum head I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Great drum heads, with a great sound: plenty of low-end but also very punchy, no additional dampening is needed to get these heads sounding good, which I often find I need to do with other kick drum heads. Additionally they are very durable and they stay in tune amazingly well. Worth the extra price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bass Drum Head
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Aquarian Bass drum heads for years. They sound great and are very durable!
customer_reviews.author: R.Zeff

customer_reviews.title: I love Aquarian
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend Aquarian drum heads. Well made, beautiful to look at, excellent sound. I can't comment on durability yet but I love them so far. The built in muffling ring does an excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: B Shuford

customer_reviews.title: It may be the best bass drum head I have played
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, no over tone , deep yet responsive head. I will purchase it in the future
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Tela

customer_reviews.title: The Super Kick 10 is my fav but the 2 model ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd fav head. The Super Kick 10 is my fav but the 2 model is a beautiful head for all types of drumming styles.Very highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kym GOSDEN

customer_reviews.title: Super Kick II should be on every drummer's wish list!
customer_reviews.text: Big time boom! I call my bass drum my "808" now since it has this amazing deep, rich boom with each beat. The dampening ring allows the drum to not have too much overtone while allowing the rich sound to ring true. I'll be sticking with this brand for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: EricFindGoodDeals

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to have this not make a kick drum sound amazing! I have used this on my vintage kit (20") and modern kits. Even on some custom kits. You simply cannot go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: McCreadyM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite. I like it a lot more than the III
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Best kick on the market. More thump than emad and all the rest. I'd give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Frauwst

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way these sound. Super punchy and a lot of low end.
customer_reviews.author: P. Berney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the to go to head for so many for a reason. Price + boom = Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G. Albers

customer_reviews.title: great roduct
customer_reviews.text: Best drum head I have used. Now hear the sound I've been looking for. I have tried many before this one but wasn't happy with the sound. Band member love the new sound.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph  Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Dude. Why did I wait so long to buy this!? Invest in your rock n roll dream
customer_reviews.author: SpartytimeExcellent!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bass sound!
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep, quality bass sound. All around great quality drum head. Installed easily and sounded great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: My go to for bass drum heads
customer_reviews.text: Aquarian super kick II are so pleasing to use. Nice slappy thud!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckyourmama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome head when not using a resonant head.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1970 Gretsch standard kit with no resonant heads, and the Aquarian SKII is the best sounding head for this drumkit. It lasts forever and still sounds pretty good and recordable even when it is ready to be swapped out for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This head made a huge improvement over the evans g2 on a really cheap kick drum.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This head gave my drum just the sound I was wanting. Fat, punchy, with no unwanted overtones. Highly recommended to anyone wanting to improve the sound of their bass drum.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Dog

customer_reviews.title: The Best Kick Out There
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking at this product, you most likely are already going to buy it since this head is almost legendary. I have it on my Pacific CX Maple kick with a Regulator reso head, and the combo is unbeatable compared to the stock Remo Powerstroke 3. Looks great, although only you as the drummer are going to see it. The floating muffling ring is incredible, no need for a pillow in the kick anymore. This head is thick enough that if you put on a kick pad as well, I can't imagine needing to replace it for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Vande Zande

customer_reviews.title: Sounds nice
customer_reviews.text: My drum kit is kind of crappy (old Pulse that's been in the attic for a decade) but this kick really sounds good on it. nice punchy BASSSSS
customer_reviews.author: Daroche

customer_reviews.title: best kick drum heads ever
customer_reviews.text: I've used these heads for years, best kick drum heads ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Kick Head of Choice
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a rocking head, look no further. DURABLE - I use a Double-kick patch on this head and it's practically bomb-proof. SOUND - Sounds good out of the box - you can muffle it further if you like, but sounds great as-is. Punchy sound and deep projection - I love it! If you're obsessed with good kick tone, this is the head for you.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Steere

customer_reviews.title: Best Kick Head.
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding kick head. Better than Remo and Evans. Quality head for recording and live. SK2 lasts too (much better than the SK1 and SK2 w/ dot).
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Just get it and stop looking around
customer_reviews.text: i had a cheap drum head and moved up to this and i like it. I never had anything else other than this but i like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I recieved a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I've been drumming for quite sometime now, primarily playing shows a few times a month. I would consider myself a hard-hitting player. I've had GREAT luck with Aquarian kick drum heads in the past, I like the Super-Kick line as they give a great tone and feel so I decided to upgrade to the SKII22. I recieved the head, installed it and enjoyed two practices with it before the inner muffling ring fell off completely and the kick sounds horrible. I think next time I'm going to stick with the original SKI22.
customer_reviews.author: justinlansdale

customer_reviews.title: Amazing head. Sounded phenominal as soon as i put ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing head. Sounded phenominal as soon as i put it on. The dampening ring is what makes this head great.
customer_reviews.author: jamesdavenport

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Very successful in deadening any resonance. It gives you the thump your looking for. Sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Mack

customer_reviews.title: my fav!
customer_reviews.text: love this head! great sound, awesome "punch" with a lot of low end. very durable, i play hard and this thing lasts! its been my kick head for a while and for good reason. Ill continue to use this, ive tried others and they dont hold up like this one. awesome head!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel R Deuley

customer_reviews.title: Stopping looking, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance. If you are looking for that right sound, this will exceed your expectations. Great full sound and volume. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Aquarian Super Kick II 22"
customer_reviews.text: You can put this head on just about any Bass Drum and it makes it sound great. I have used both 22 and 24" inch Bass Drums with Super Kick 2's and it turns it into thunder with no hollow overtones and no need to put pillows inside your drums. I'm not complaining but if all drummers used these then the price would come down, lol, but seriously they are worth every penny !!! Love the SK2 !!!
customer_reviews.author: psbonham

customer_reviews.title: This drum head has been my go to for years ...
customer_reviews.text: This drum head has been my go to for years. The muffle ring is JUST enough to dampen any overtones without the need to do anything else to the drum. No silly pillows or blankets in my bass drum. Don't be afraid to put a little tension on it, too often I find folks leave their bass drum heads too loose.
customer_reviews.author: mckenziedrums

customer_reviews.title: Bad QC?  :(
customer_reviews.text: this last one I got came with ripples in it... I needed to use it as my other one was broken completely. It sounds a little dead. Have never had one come to me bad before... -Steve
customer_reviews.author: spburns84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best bass drum head on the market. I've been using these exclusively for over ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: we love the sound from this head
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the same head that we put the kick mallet through. Hopefully this one holds up longer than 6 months, but either way, we love the sound from this head!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: On my son's Christmas list
customer_reviews.text: This was on my son's Christmas list - he likes using this type of drumhead.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

product_meta.title: Aquarian Drumheads Super-Kick II Drumhead Pack (SKII22)

feature_bullets: Built in floating felt muffle ring
